Text: Oñ i lewatu abu kʼa mudaru bʼuma te̩, kʼa la tʼo̩ko a le ogbogbolo nyi Ko̩s, tak o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ a nyi Rode̩s, oñ akwo̩mo a nyi Patara;
oñ abu kʼa fʼo̩ko̩ kʼi adaba nyi Fonisia li, kʼa la tʼo, a kwane̩ ule̩-wa.
Oñ abu kʼa li Saipro̩s, kʼa la mu dʼu tinyo̩ o̩wo̩ a wo hi, a nyi Siria, tak a mane̩ Taya, todu o̩mo̩ oñ o̩ko̩ le̩ akʼadu-wñ jʼane̩.
Oñ abu kʼa fʼamako̩che̩ li a jʼo̩jo̩ mebie o̩mo̩; ama le̩ laño̩ ka ñw Po̩l lef Afu kʼi we ete̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ e̩gba kʼa fʼo̩jo̩ le̩ je̩ kpa, a kwo̩mo̩ le oñ a mʼe̩re̩ ko nyʼule̩-wa. O̩chaka-ma manyʼabobule̩ kpʼabimo̩to̩ chaihite̩ wa gbogbo wʼo̩do̩da ewo le̩. Tak a kʼokuku-wa nyane̩ ogbe̩ga o̩mo̩ achadua.
Tak a chʼo̩la-wa agbo, oñ a kwotʼo̩ko̩, abo le̩ la mudabi tʼunyi-ma.
Oñ abu kʼa mʼoji ule̩-wa da kwo̩ Taya a lewa To̩le̩me̩is, tak abu kʼa fʼamo̩maye le̩ gwa, a jʼo̩jo̩ʼka kpʼama.
Oñ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ a kwʼo̩mo̩ oñ a lewa Se̩saria; a la mugudu tef unyi Filip, ajuche̩nyo̩ kʼi dʼef amamebie le̩, a kwogugu ugbo owñ.
E̩ne̩ kide̩ la nʼamo̩monobule̩ me̩le̩ ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n ku ma jʼakache̩.
Oñ abu kʼa bʼuma nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ pe̩, akache̩ʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Agabus gwo̩ru kwo Judia wa.

Tak i lewa ugbo wa, oñ i mʼe̩wñ ujiñmi Po̩l du oñ i fʼo̩la-wñ o̩wo̩ kpʼe̩re̩ ji, i kakini, E-kʼAfu Kiafo̩ ka de̩ kakini, Abe̩le̩ oñ amaJu ku ma jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m aji e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi nʼe̩wñ ujiñmi kide̩ ku ma la adʼu tef o̩wo̩ abo uche̩ichi.
Tak abu kʼa gbʼe̩wñ-i, tʼawa tʼabo ugbo kide̩ a gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kʼi we ete̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m.
E̩gbale̩ Po̩l dohi kakini, E̩wñ me̩ che-i? Aku ero̩ kpʼe̩do̩-mi egulo̩-i? Todu omi o̩la-mi che̩mu tod eji kate n ama todu kʼu ku efu Je̩rusale̩m tod odu Ondu Jisus kpo̩fo̩.
Oñ abu kʼe̩do̩-wñ ma je̩ gba n, a chechi, a kakini, E̩wñ ki du Ondu e̩do̩ ki wache ke.
Tak abu kʼo̩jo̩ le̩ lerʼane̩ a mʼane̩-wa ño̩ oñ a mute̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m.
Amako̩che̩ iche̩ka ku ma kwo Se̩saria ño̩ lebʼuwa, ma ko wa nyʼunyi Mnason e̩ne̩ Saipro̩s kʼi chʼako̩che̩ kwʼigbele kʼa aru unyi-wñ.
Oñ abu kʼawa lewa Je̩rusale̩m, amo̩maye le̩ yo̩ ñw wa tabale̩.
Tak o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ Po̩l lebʼuwa nyʼejefu ugbo Jeme̩s; oñ abogijo chaka wajʼo̩mo̩.
Tak abu kʼi fʼuma gwa, i fʼe̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ che ef abo uche̩ichi lef e̩wñ kʼi ache ñw one̩ le̩ choli jʼane̩ ñw ma okoke.
Tak abu ku ma gbo̩ ma kwodojima ñw O̩jo̩, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, O̩maye-wa, e̩ cheli abu kʼamaJu icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ wewe ku ma ke̩do̩no jʼemi, o̩chaka-ma la go̩laru o̩lo̩da.
Amone̩ la nʼalu-ma aka o̩la-we̩ ñw ma kakini, Uwe̩ ako̩ amaJu du ku ma jʼef abo uche̩ichi ku ma dabi wʼubi bu Mose̩s te̩, ka ku ma ki we̩ ede̩pi amo̩ma-ma, kʼama ki we etale ef e̩wñ o̩gu-wa.
Todule̩ abʼi de̩ ta? Ma la agbo̩ chuu ka kʼuwe̩ lewa.
Todule̩ e̩ ki nache e̩wñ kʼa ka ñwʼe-i. Abo̩ke̩le̩ me̩le̩ jʼugbo wa ku ma dʼoji;

e̩ ki mʼabo le̩ ko kʼe̩ fʼo̩la-we̩ gwo rinyo̩ manyʼama; oñ e̩wñ du ku ma kpabie̩ ef uwñ e̩ fʼo̩me̩-wñ ra todu ku ma ki fʼoji-ma la, tak amone̩ du ama ka kʼo̩la e̩wñ-we̩ du kʼamone̩ nʼalu-ma aka ñw ma le̩ chʼofofo, ama kʼuwe̩ onugo alule̩ tʼo̩kpakpa kʼe̩ la nʼo̩lo̩da ade.
Oñ i chʼe-abo uche̩ichi ku ma ke̩do̩no le̩, a dama nyʼo̩takada ako̩ rʼuma me̩, a la fʼibe ñwañw ma ku ma fʼo̩la-ma de̩ ugbo e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ kpʼe̩bie̩ kpʼe̩wñ ku ma kpa okutulu kpʼabutabu eche.

E̩gbale̩ Po̩l mʼaboke̩le̩ le̩ ko, tak o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ abu kʼu ma fʼo̩la-ma gworinyo̩, i le̩bʼuma nyʼef unyi O̩jo̩, ma nʼaluka o̩jo̩ ku ma aje̩ tak o̩la-ma egwo̩rinyo̩ ajo̩ kpa gbogbo tak uma akʼe̩wñ ele-O̩jo̩ wa tod e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ma adu kpogo.
Ama abu kʼo̩jo̩ mebie le̩ bo̩ pe̩ ki jo̩ kpa, amaJu ku ma kwo Esia fʼowñ li ef unyi O̩jo̩, ma fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ du ke̩che̩ oñ ma dʼo̩wo̩ dʼo,

ma nakwa kakini, Aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l, me̩ te̩ko wa! E̩ne̩ kʼi ako̩ amone̩ du ugbo du o̩la agwunyu amone̩ kpʼo̩lo̩da kpʼuña-i de̩; i laño̩ mʼabo̩ Grik ko wʼef unyi O̩jo̩-i, oñ i mʼuña kiafo̩-i du che e̩wño̩ja.
Todu ma fu Trofimus e̩ne̩ E̩fe̩sus le̩ li o̩gbo̩gba ef ewo kpʼowñ, oñ ma nibe ka ku Po̩l dʼu wʼef unyi O̩jo̩.
Tak ogbo̩ ewo le̩ du mudogo. Oñ amone̩ mute̩gidi jʼugboʼkate, oñ abu ku ma gwo̩nyu Po̩l, ma fʼowñ fa wʼo̩do̩da unyi O̩jo̩, tak ababale̩ ma fʼo̩na-wñ re.
Oñ abu ku ma jʼafeju alu ku ma ale ku ma dʼowñ kpa, inabali-wñ lewa ugbo onu-ogu le̩, kakini, Ogbo̩ Je̩rusale̩m du mudutu.
E̩re̩re̩le̩ i mʼamisoja kpai amagboji uche̩ amisoja ko oñ i fule gwo̩ru abʼuma ma: tak abu ku ma li onu-ogu kpʼamisoja-ma, ma we ekpa Po̩l.
E̩gbale̩ onu-ogu le̩ te̩wa agwo̩nyʼu, oñ i je̩ ñw ma nʼigbaligba meji fʼu ji; tak i chane̩ egwili e̩ne̩ kʼi che, kpai e̩wñ kʼi che.
Tak abo iche̩ka ef o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ nʼomudala ka e̩wñʼka, abomune̩ ka e̩wñ omune̩. Oñ abu kʼi ma neke ma o̩kpakpa-wñ tod ekuku le̩ n, i je̩ ñw ma mʼowñ du le tef aku.
Ama e̩gba kʼi ate̩gu ubo̩ agube amisoja mu Po̩l du okudododo tod o̩wo̩ amone̩ ku ma gwo̩ko̩ rʼu o̩la;
todu ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ le̩ tʼo̩ ubi akwa kakini, Me̩ mʼowñ du alo!
Ama abu ku ma che ku ma du Po̩l nyʼef aku le̩ i ka ñw onu-ogu le̩ kakini, O̩da aje̩ ñw mi ka e̩wñʼka ñw e̩? Oñ i kakini, Uwe̩, e̩ chegbo̩ Griki?
Mak i chʼuwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ Ijipti kʼi fʼamone̩ do̩wo̩ o̩gbo̩gba le̩ kʼi laño̩ mʼamakpone̩ icham me̩lu le̩ ko le tef aje̩tachi le̩ n?
Po̩l kakini, Omi chʼe̩ne̩ Ju, abo Tarsus, omane̩ Silisia ki ma chʼewo e̩fule̩fu n. Narʼoduʼka bʼuwe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw mi ko̩la ñw amone̩-i.
Tak abu kʼi mʼo̩da du ñwʼu, Po̩l kwodago oj ubo̩ ku ma te̩gu le oñ i chʼo̩wo̩ pe̩pe̩ ñw amone̩ le̩; tak abu ku ma we hioli i nʼomudala ka ñw ma alu Hibru kakini:
